project_description1: Discover the world of WF Design + Build through our interactive web application, showcasing theirs cutting-edge projects, rich company history, and commitment to excellence in construction and design since 2005
project_description2: Universo Games is a social bookmarking and news aggregator websites where users can add text, images, videos or links. Users can vote up or down on content, making it appear in featured posts
project_description3: In this project, I recreated an online watch store where users will be able to browse and discover the available products, as well as add products to the shopping cart and finally process their orders
